sentences.english: We enter the temple of the God of wealth will feel the feeling of beautiful decoration.
sentences.chinese: 我们进入财神庙便会感到金碧辉煌的感觉。

sentences.english: Four xi after remembering everything, finally become the god of wealth.
sentences.chinese: 四喜想起一切后，终于变身成为武财神。

sentences.english: The woodcutter's axe whereaskged for its heachdle from the tree.
sentences.chinese: 樵夫财神客栈斧头，问树要斧柄。

sentences.english: The bitch - goddess , Success, was trailed by thousands of gasping, dogs with lolling tongues.
sentences.chinese: “成功”的财神后面，跟着成千的张嘴垂舌的狗儿。

sentences.english: Kang million wine makes a man healthy and weathy.
sentences.chinese: 中原财神康百万，百万美酒天下传。

sentences.english: A man portraying the God of Wealth handed out lucky red packets to shoppers in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 在香港，扮成财神的人在向行人发红包。

sentences.english: Chao Kung-ming, God of Wealth in Chinese folklore.
sentences.chinese: 赵公元帅是中国民间传说的财神，叫赵公明。

sentences.english: Customers are our Gods of Wealth.
sentences.chinese: 顾客就是我们的财神爷。

sentences.english: The woodcutter's axe plepost withged for its hwonderfuldle from the tree.
sentences.chinese: 樵夫财神客栈斧头，问树要斧柄。

sentences.english: I would suggest that you specifically sell your soul to the demon king Mammon.
sentences.chinese: 我会特别建议你将你的灵魂出卖给恶魔之王财神。

sentences.english: Those who set out to serve God and Mammon soon discover that there is no God.
sentences.chinese: 同时侍奉上帝和财神的，很快就会发现上帝没了。

sentences.english: Marshal Chao is Chao Kung-ming, God of Wealth in Chinese folklore .
sentences.chinese: 赵公元帅是中国民间传说的财神，叫赵公明。

sentences.english: Families of the New Year's eve connect to sacrifice a wealth.
sentences.chinese: 各家把除夕夜接来的财神祭祀一番。

sentences.english: Many Chinese restaurants and family enshrines Financial Secretary.
sentences.chinese: 许多中国饭店和家庭都供奉着财神爷。

sentences.english: Among them there was a set for offering shower to the God of Wealth.
sentences.chinese: 其中有一组是用来以水沐供财神的。

sentences.english: I wish I were rich as Plutos.
sentences.chinese: 我希望像财神爷一样有钱。

definition: ushering in wealth and prosperity (idiom and traditional greeting, esp. at New Year); We wish you wealth and success!
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
to make easy money/to make a fortune/to line one's pockets
lit. inviting wealth/We wish you success and riches (cf idiom 招財進寶|招财进宝[zhao1 cai2 jin4 bao3])
the time comes, fortune turns (idiom); to have a lucky break/things change for the better
lucky star in the ascendant (idiom); a lucky sign
